thread.title: After Dipika Kakar, Dheeraj Dhoopar bids adieu to Sasural Simar Ka
thread.title_full: After Dipika Kakar, Dheeraj Dhoopar bids adieu to Sasural Simar Ka

author: Urmimala Banerjee
title: After Dipika Kakar, Dheeraj Dhoopar bids adieu to Sasural Simar Ka
text:
After Dipika Kakar, Dheeraj Dhoopar bids adieu to Sasural Simar Ka Dheeraj Dhoopar follows Dipika Kakar's footsteps and quits Sasural Simar Ka By Urmimala Banerjee | Published: March 2, 2017 1:17 pm PHOTOS: Sasural Simar Ka’s Dheeraj Dhoopar and Vinny Arora had a blast at their Sangeet ceremony 
It is a month of exits for Sasural Simar Ka. After Dipika Kakar , who played the titular role of Simar quit, it is lead actor Dheeraj Dhoopar who has put in his papers. We guess that like Dipika, it is monotony that has exhausted Dheeraj as well. The actor will shoot his last on March 8. Sasural Simar Ka has been a landmark show in Dheeraj’s career and made him a household. He came in as a replacement for Shoaib Ibrahim who left the serial in 2013. The actor has seen the show through its successful supernatural phase and was playing father to two married daughters. He is just 32 in real life. (Also Read: Vinny Arora’s bikini avatar, Nakuul Mehta’s killer looks, Ekta Kaul’s sex appeal- TV Insta this week) 
The actor conveyed his decision to the production team and puts in his papers in January. He is now serving notice period. In a statement to The Times of India, Dheeraj said, “I am parting on a good note. I have quit the show for better opportunities and want to take up a romantic show next. If a project materialises, I could be back on screen within no time. Otherwise, I would like to work on my body and return in a new avatar.” The actor got married in November to long-time girlfriend Vinny Arora. (Also Read: Dheeraj Dhoopar and Vinny Arora’s sangeet was a fun filled affair – View Pics) 
In the mean time, Keerti Kelkar is all set to be the new Simar on Sasural Simar Ka. She will start shooting in a few days. This is her comeback on TV shows after six years. Incidentally, Dipika’s beau Shoaib Ibrahim and Keerti’s husband Sharad Kelkar are sharing screen space in Star Plus’ supernatural drama, Koi Laut Ke Aaya Hai. Stay tuned to Bollywood Life for more updates….
